body_content.explanation: value in a property that comes from work that has been done to improve it:
examples: They bought a place that was in need of work, hoping to build a little sweat equity.
The donation would give your property a new valuation of £228,000 (your sweat equity plus the cash).

body_content.explanation: work that is done to increase the value of a property:
examples: The development of the property has been a labour of love filled with sweat equity.
The sweat equity he put into painting it, installing new windows, and replacing flooring must have helped.
